member.name: T:Moon.Validation.AttributeCache
member.summary: The cache of Validation and Display attributes.
member.remarks: This internal class serves as a cache of validation attributes and [Display] attributes. It exists both to help performance as well as to abstract away the differences between Reflection and TypeDescriptor.

member.name: M:Moon.Validation.AttributeCache.GetTypeValidationAttributes(System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ValidationContext)
member.summary: Retrieves the type level validation attributes for the given type.
member.param: The context that describes the type.

member.summary: Retrieves the name that is used for display in the UI.
member.param: The context that describes the type.

member.name: M:Moon.Validation.AttributeCache.GetPropertyValidationAttributes(System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ValidationContext)
member.summary: Retrieves the set of validation attributes for the property.
member.param: The context that describes the property.

member.summary: Retrieves the name that is used for display in the UI.
member.param: The context that describes the property.

member.name: T:Moon.Validation.MoonValidator
member.summary: Better Data Annotations validator.

member.name: M:Moon.Validation.MoonValidator.IsValid(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns whether the given object is valid or not.
member.param: The object to test. It cannot be null.

member.name: M:Moon.Validation.MoonValidator.Validate(System.Object)
member.summary: Validates the given object and returns an enumeration of s for the failures.

remarks.para: This method evaluates all s attached to the object instance's type or it's properties. It will also execute the method.
For any given property, if it has a that fails validation, no other validators will be evaluated for that property.

member.param: The object to test. It cannot be null.

member.name: M:Moon.Validation.MoonValidator.IsValid``1(``0,System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,System.Object}}[])
member.summary: Returns whether the given properties are valid or not.
member.param: The object properties are defined on. It cannot be null.
An array of properties to test. It can be empty, but cannot be null.

member.name: M:Moon.Validation.MoonValidator.Validate``1(``0,System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,System.Object}}[])
member.summary: Validates the given properties and returns an enumeration of s for the failures.

remarks.para: For any given property, if it has a that fails validation, no other validators will be evaluated for that property.

member.param: The object properties are defined on. It cannot be null.
An array of properties to test. It can be empty, but cannot be null.
